solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String findLongestWord(String s, List<String> d) {--newline--        String longest = "";--newline--        for (String dictWord : d) {--newline--            int i = 0;--newline--            for (char c : s.toCharArray()) --newline--                if (i < dictWord.length() && c == dictWord.charAt(i)) i++;--newline--    --newline--            if (i == dictWord.length() && dictWord.length() >= longest.length()) --newline--                if (dictWord.length() > longest.length() || dictWord.compareTo(longest) < 0)--newline--                    longest = dictWord;--newline--        }--newline--        return longest;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
